SEARCH
Package com.instancesobp.models

Class Warehouse

java.lang.Object
com.instancesobp.models.Warehouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Warehouse extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a warehouse with its configuration, aisles, and orders. This class provides methods to manage the warehouse's properties, including its aisles, orders, and various operational parameters. It also includes utility methods for printing and accessing warehouse details.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Gil Borr√°s

  • Constructor Details

    • Warehouse

      public Warehouse()
      Default constructor for the Warehouse class. Initializes empty lists for aisles and orders.

    • Warehouse

      public Warehouse(int numberOfOrders, int numberOfAisles, int numberOfItems, int depotPlacement, int orderLocation, double shelfLength, double shelfWidth, double aisleWidth, double workerCapacity, double pickingTime, double outsideTurnTime, double insideTurnTime, int numberOfSlots, List<Aisles> aisles, List<Order> orders)
      Parameterized constructor for the Warehouse class. Initializes the warehouse with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      numberOfOrders - Number of orders in the warehouse.
      numberOfAisles - Number of aisles in the warehouse.
      numberOfItems - Total number of items in the warehouse.
      depotPlacement - Placement of the depot table.
      orderLocation - Location of the orders in the warehouse.
      shelfLength - Length of the shelves.
      shelfWidth - Width of the shelves.
      aisleWidth - Width of the aisles.
      workerCapacity - Capacity of the worker.
      pickingTime - Time required for picking an item.
      outsideTurnTime - Time required for turning outside the aisle.
      insideTurnTime - Time required for turning inside the aisle.
      numberOfSlots - Number of slots available in the warehouse.
      aisles - List of aisles in the warehouse.
      orders - List of orders in the warehouse.
